relevance_explanation: The routine includes only the steps relevant to the customer based on their data. The irrelevant steps and branches related to non-frequent flyers and other payment methods have been correctly removed.
completeness_explanation: All necessary logic, tools, and branches that apply to this customer type (Gold frequent flyer paying with points) have been preserved. The routine correctly handles the case of a frequent flyer and proceeds directly to priority flight search and booking via points.
